text: The 2014 French Athletics Championships was the 126th edition of the national championship in outdoor track and field for France. It was held on 11–13 July at the Stade Georges-Hébert in Reims. A total of 38 events (divided evenly between the sexes) were contested over the three-day competition. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |100 metres | Christophe Lemaitre || 10.14 | Ben Bassaw || 10.34 |
